name: ohhh... Balls!
description:
Good Day!

Hello, this is another game of mine inspired on mouse-only dodging games! Have fun!

Goal:
  • To dodge the red circles.
  • To survive as long as you can.
Mechanics: 
  • Use your mouse to dodge the circles.
  • Avoid the edge of the screen. you will lose if you go over it.
  • Left Click to pause the game, press the yellow button to unpause.
Features:
  • Has 5 different attack patterns
  • Has Increasing Difficulty, balls will move and spawn faster as time goes on.
  • Cute background music, Thank you Daystar!
  • Keeps track of your highscore, tell your friends that they can't beat you!

Credits:

Daystar

Murkje

Pixel Frog

Game Dev Community

Music Info:

🎈Song : 샛별 - Sugar cookie / https://youtu.be/jFVguCEVAUs
